alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 8:53PM EST until January 05 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding due to recent excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.3 feet tomorrow evening. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM EST.
